com.tectonica.jonix.stream

Class JonixFilesStreamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tectonica.jonix.stream.JonixStreamer
      • com.tectonica.jonix.stream.JonixFilesStreamer

  • public class JonixFilesStreamer
extends JonixStreamer
    Simple extension of JonixStreamer that adds some APIs for handling ONIX sources stored in files and directories (and not just InputStream as the parent). It accepts file names and file lists, as well as directory names for pattern-based scanning.

    In its constructor it takes a JonixFilesExtractor which is a corresponding extension to the basic JonixExtractor, adding file-related events.

    Author:
    Zach Melamed
